overview:
CEO and Founder of Lusyte overseeing all operational, technical and sales/marketing aspects of the business.

Pushing industry boundaries and operationalizing innovative ideas has been the common thread throughout Carolinâ€™s 16 year-long business development and client services career. She saw opportunities in affordable interior design for young professionals at George Spencer (London), joined a ground-breaking wine start up called Oriel, worked with a bold innovator of New York real estate sales and marketing at AgencySacks and build a luxury business at HNW, a digital marketing agency. Four years at Young & Rubicam round out her communications foundation. Past clients: Gucci Group, Ermenegildo Zegna, Sothebyâ€™s, Philippe Stark and Altria. BA Brown University and MBA INSEAD.
